author: Analysis by James Griffiths, CNN
title: China and much of Asia is walking a knife edge between recovery and another wave of coronavirus cases
description: In China, despite a gradual return to normal, there are signs of a concern felt across Asia: that any recovery from the virus may be fleeting, and a new wave of infections -- and the lockdowns, death and misery they bring with them -- may be just over the hor…
content:
Hong Kong (CNN)In the central Chinese city of Wuhan, where cases of the novel coronavirus were first detected late last year, the mood was one of triumph this week, as residents finally emerged from months of lockdown. 
This was reflected in state media, as … [+6364 chars]
